home.title: Welcome to WeAreSwissBorg!
home.subtitle: The association that supports you in your crypto adventure!

community.thecryptophil: Discover SwissBorg with Smart Caf√© from TheCryptoPhil

whoarewe.title: Who are we ?
whoarewe.content: WeAreSwissBorg is much more than just an association. We're a passionate community, committed to sharing knowledge and democratizing the use of crypto-assets and the SwissBorg ecosystem.

ourmission.title: Our objectives
ourmission.blockchain.title: Promoting blockchain
ourmission.blockchain.content: We believe in the power of blockchain technology. Our aim is to make it accessible to everyone, by explaining its benefits and encouraging its use.
ourmission.education.title: Educate and Inform
ourmission.education.content: Education is at the heart of our approach. We provide clear, accessible educational content, so that everyone can understand and make informed decisions.
ourmission.community.title: Supporting the Community
ourmission.community.content: We are here to support and strengthen the SwissBorg community. By encouraging the exchange of knowledge and experience, we foster an environment where everyone can learn and grow.
ourmission.democratization.title: Democratizing Crypto-Actives
ourmission.democratization.content: We believe in a financial future open to all. By democratizing access to crypto-assets, we want to create opportunities for everyone, everywhere in the world.
ourmission.comment: Join us on this adventure to shape the financial future together, by learning, sharing and growing within our WeareSwissBorg community!

footer.message: WeAreSwissBorg is an association that aims to promote the use of blockchain and crypto-assets, provide educational content on these technologies, particularly related to Swissborg, and support actions related to this ecosystem.
footer.subtitle: The association
